## Carga de datos

```{r}
load("accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
library(tibble)
accidentes <- accidentes2020_data |> as_tibble()

```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes |> count(sexo)
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualizar

```{r}
#| code-fold: true

ggplot(resumen) + 
  geom_col(aes(x=sexo, y= n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) + 
  theme_minimal()
```
